DOC.brief_summary: The study plans to compare the glucose-lowering effect of gurmar, a herbal preparation, with metformin in patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Double Blind Randomized Trial to Compare Gurmar (Gymnema Sylvestre) With Metformin in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Newly detected type 2 diabetes Fasting plasma glucose >126mg/dl HbA1c > 7% Serious comorbid illnesss History of drug abuse History of recent weight loss
